front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Packet-based Fronthaul Transport Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The architecture and requirements for next generation fronthaul networks are specified in this standard. NGFI-I is defined as the next generation fronthaul network with low layer splits in a baseband station. NGFI-II is defined as the next generation fronthaul network with high layer splits in a baseband station. The requirements of fronthaul transport nodes in these networks are also specified.
